duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform product merchandising in assigned retail stores using a handheld mobile device to replenish, straighten, and track inventory of Hallmark products.
Interact in a professional manner with store employees, store management, and customers while in the store.
Work a flexible schedule, typically Monday through Friday, with increased hours during holiday periods.
Participate in department remodels and resets, including building fixtures, moving card departments, and remodeling card departments.

Physically demanding job involving pushing, pulling, lifting, and carrying merchandise throughout the workday, as well as stooping, squatting, walking, and standing. May also involve climbing stairs and step ladders.
Access to Wi-Fi network and the internet, ability to operate handheld technology, flexibility to work changing schedules, reliable transportation, and eligibility to work in the United States.
Required to work the week before and the week after major holidays.
